description: Information about groups of attributes describing a coverage.

___attributeContentType.description: Type of information represented by the values

___boundUnits.description: The unit in which sensor wavelengths are expressed.

___attributeIdentifier.description: Identifiers for each attribute included in the resource. NOTE: These identifiers can be used to provide names for the attribute from a standard set of names.

___standardDeviation.description: The standard deviation of data values in the attribute.

___bandBoundaryDefinition.description: Designation of criterion for defining maximum and minimum wavelengths for a spectral band.

___numberOfValues.description: Tthe number of values used in a thematic-Classification resource.

___boundMax.description: The longest wavelength that the sensor is capable of collecting within a designated band.

___bitsPerValue.description: The maximum number of significant bits in the uncompressed representation for the value in each pixel.

___scaleFactor.description: The scale factor which has been applied to the attribute.

___meanValue.description: The mean value of data values in the attribute.

___offset.description: The physical value corresponding to an attribute value of zero.

___minValue.description: The minimum value of data values in the domain of the attribute.

ISO 19115-2: MI_CoverageDescription > gmd:dimension > gmd:MD_Band > gmd:units > gml:unitDefinition > gml:identifier

___units.description: The units of data in which the attribute is expressed.

ISO 19115-2: MI_CoverageDescription >  gmd:dimension > gmd:MD:Band > gmd:sequenceIdentifier > gco:MemberName > gco:aName

___sequenceIdentifier.description: Unique name or number that identifies attributes included in the coverage.

___peakResponse.description: The wavelength at which the sensor response is highest.

___toneGradations.description: The number of discrete numerical values in the grid data.

ISO 19115-2: MI_CoverageDescription > gmd:dimension > gmd:MD:Band > gmd:sequenceIdentifier > gco:MemberName > gco:attributeType > gco:TypeName > gco:aName

___sequenceIdentifierType.description: The type of unique name or number that identifies attributes.

___transferFunctionType.description: Type of transfer function to be used when scaling a physical value for a given element.

___nominalSpatialResolution.description: The smallest distance between which separate points can be distinguished, as specified in instrument design.

___boundMin.description: The shortest wavelength that the sensor is capable of collecting within a designated band.

___maxValue.description: The maximum value of data values in the domain of the attribute
